A report has been logged and a team of b: Se ha registrado un informe y se ha enviado un equipo de ardillas que eliminan errores para que se ocupen de la situación.
Password reset not enabled. Contact your: El restablecimiento de contraseña no está habilitado. Póngase en contacto con su administrador.
Enter your email address below and we'll: Ingrese su dirección de correo electrónico a continuación y le enviaremos un enlace para restablecer su contraseña.
Password reset. Log in with your new pas: Restablecimiento de contraseña. Inicie sesión con su nueva contraseña
You have requested a link to change your: You have requested a link to change your password. You can do this through this link:
If you did not request this, please igno: If you did not request this, please ignore this email.
Your password will not change until you: Su contraseña no cambiará hasta que acceda al enlace anterior y establezca una nueva.
Configuration key %s saved: Se guardó la clave de configuración% s
Restart server. Try reloading the page a: Reinicie el servidor. Intente volver a cargar la página después de unos segundos después de presionar este botón.
Hosting on this site is provided for fre: Hosting on this site is provided for free and with no guarantee of availability or security of your application.
This facility is intended solely for you: This facility is intended solely for you to evaluate the suitability of Saltcorn.
If you would like to store private infor: Si desea almacenar información privada que debe estar segura, utilice Saltcorn autohospedado.
Please select a name for your applicatio: Please select a name for your application. The name will determine the address at which it will be available.
Success! Your new application is availab: ¡Éxito! Su nueva aplicación está disponible en:
Please click the above link now to creat: Please click the above link now to create the first user.

Four different ways to get started using: Four different ways to get started using Saltcorn
Start by creating the tables to hold you: Start by creating the tables to hold your data
When you have created the tables, you ca: Cuando haya creado las tablas, puede crear vistas para que los usuarios puedan interactuar con los datos.
You can also start by creating a page.
You can skip creating a table by hand by: You can skip creating a table by hand by uploading a CSV file from a spreadsheet.
If you have a backup from a previous Sal: If you have a backup from a previous Saltcorn instance, you can also restore it.
Instead of building, get up and running: Instead of building, get up and running in no time with packs
Packs are collections of tables, views a: Packs are collections of tables, views and plugins that give you a full application which you can then edit to suit your needs.
Name: Nombre
The Wiki contains the documentation and: El Wiki contiene la documentación y los tutoriales sobre la instalación y el uso de Saltcorn.
The YouTube channel has some video tutor: The YouTube channel has some video tutorials
You can copy the pack contents below to: You can copy the pack contents below to another Saltcorn installation.

Set to blank to omit table from global search.

APIs allow developers access to your dat: Las API permiten a los desarrolladores acceder a sus datos sin utilizar una interfaz de usuario.

First, please give some basic informatio: Primero, proporcione información básica sobre la vista.

A short name that will be in your URL: A short name that will be in your URL
Title: Título
Set fixed states for views: Establecer estados fijos para las vistas
The root page is the page that is served: La página raíz es la página que se sirve cuando el usuario visita la ubicación de inicio (/). Esto se puede configurar para cada rol de usuario.
A default value is required when adding: A default value is required when adding required fields to nonempty tables
Please create your first user account, w: Please create your first user account, which will have administrative privileges. You can add other users and give them administrative privileges later.
Views define how table rows are displaye: Las vistas definen cómo se muestran las filas de la tabla al usuario
